job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtltugtCompanyltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDandy is a businessinabox for dentists Our vision is to become the operating system for every dental office in America by leading the transition to digital dentistry for the 200 billion industry Headquartered in New York City Dandy is backed by the worlds leading venture capital investorsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDandy is hiring a xxxltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtWhat Were Looking ForltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtWith the above stated we are open to candidates of all backgrounds and encourage you to apply if interested Dandy is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive team and none of the above points are 100 requiredltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtBonus Points ForltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtTime spent at a venturebacked startup during hypergrowthltligtltligtRelentlessly positive attitude strong sense of humor and the ability to have fun at workltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBest in class healthcare including medical dental and visionltligtltligtCompetitive salary and equity packagesltligtltligtFully stocked kitchen with snacks and coffeeltligtltligt401k program ltbrgtltligtltulgtDandy is proud to be an equal opportunity employer We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive culture and celebrate authenticity We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation age marital status disability protected veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics
